name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. In a pan, sauté onion and garlic in olive oil. Add ground beef and cook until browned. Pour in tomato sauce, add basil, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 15 minutes and serve over spaghetti.

name: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions. In a pan, cook chicken with butter until done. Add garlic, cream, and parmesan. Stir until cheese melts, then combine with fettuccine and serve.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan. Add ginger and garlic, followed by broccoli, carrot, and bell pepper. Stir fry for 5 minutes, then add soy sauce and cook until vegetables are tender.

name: Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning. Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and a dollop of sour cream.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop lettuce and place in a bowl. Add croutons and parmesan. Drizzle with caesar dressing and toss to combine.

name: French Toast
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla. Dip bread slices in the mixture, then cook on a buttered pan until golden. Serve with maple syrup.

name: Beef Stew
instructions: In a pot, cook beef until browned. Add vegetables, beef broth, thyme, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 2 hours until beef is tender.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter two slices of bread, place cheese between them, and grill in a pan until bread is golden and cheese is melted.

name: Tomato Basil Soup
instructions: Sauté garlic and onion in olive oil. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer, blend, and add basil before serving.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices. Grill chicken until cooked, then simmer with tomato sauce and cream for 20 minutes.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread. Mash avocado and season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. Spread on toast and serve.

name: Banana Pancakes
instructions: Mash bananas, add eggs, flour, milk, baking powder, and salt. Mix well and cook in a buttered pan until golden.

name: Guacamole
instructions: Mash avocado, add lime juice, diced onion, and cilantro. Season with salt and pepper, then mix and serve.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream butter and sugars. Add egg and vanilla, then flour, baking soda, and chocolate chips. Spoon onto a baking sheet and bake at 350°F for 10 minutes.

name: Margherita Pizza
instructions: Spread tomato sauce on pizza dough, add mozzarella and basil. Bake at 450°F for 10-15 minutes until crust is golden.

name: Egg Salad
instructions: Boil and chop eggs, mix with mayonnaise, mustard, salt, pepper, and diced celery.

name: Fish Tacos
instructions: Season and cook fish, then place in taco shells with cabbage, sour cream, cilantro, and lime.

name: Garlic Shrimp Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté garlic in butter and olive oil, add shrimp and cook until pink. Toss with pasta and parsley.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Layer on a plate with basil, drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar, and season with salt and pepper.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds. Mix beef, rice, onion, garlic, and tomato sauce. Fill peppers, top with cheese, and bake at 375°F for 25 minutes.

name: Oil Brusceta
instructions: Put oil on bread, then add salt.
